pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)50$(br)$(#bd951a)Damage:$()$(#ff0000)7$(br)$(#bd951a)Speed:$()$(#ff0000)Slow$(br)$(#bd951a)Spawn Rate:$()$(#ff0000)17s$(br)$(#bd951a)Special:$()$(#ff0000)Summons 4 Backup Dancer Zombies around him.$(br2)$(#bd951a)Dancing Zombie's latest album, "GrarrBRAINSarblarbl," is already rocketing up the undead charts.

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Any resemblance between Dancing Zombie and persons living or dead is purely coincidental.
